name: Protect Your Planet!!
description:
Destroy the meteors falling on your planet!! Don't worry if you miss one or two since Earth has been bestowed with a mighty Force field. But don't try to rely on it too much! Use Your Special Weapons to wreak havoc on the meteors when they are available.

Controls:

Mouse Left Click/Drag -  Destroy Meteors

Mouse Left Click - Select Special Weapons (Keyboard Shortcut 1/2)

Mouse Right Click - Deselect Special Weapons

Q - Pause Game

Space - Change Game Speed
